1604066552_mirrored_Adrianzo_github.body:
Same issue here, trying to register a new identity and getting this error "Error while during request: error
undefined"

If by working you mean, do I see the word "OK" when I visit the page,
then yes it is :)

Ok I found it: I am using noscript and ublock origin to prevent loading js script by default, and though 127.0.0.1 is whitelisted zeroid.qc.to was not. I was able to create an ID by disabling the 2 of them temporarily.

Thanks for the help
